hero.title: About MEB CBC Rwanda
hero.subtitle: Empowering communities through film and training

story.title: Who We Are
story.content: MEB CBC is a nonprofit film and media production company focused on producing live-action films, documentaries, animation, and video games.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To produce world-class films and provide professional film production services while creating sustainable opportunities for Rwandan youth and women through comprehensive training and job creation in the film and animation industry.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be East Africa's leading social enterprise in film production, recognized for both our creative excellence and our transformative impact on communities through media education and empowerment.

differentiators.title: Professional Excellence
differentiators.description: We deliver the same high-quality production  services as any commercial film company, with experienced crews and international standards.

differentiators.title: Social Impact
differentiators.description: Every project you do with us directly funds training programs for underprivileged youth and women, creating lasting change in communities.

differentiators.title: Local Expertise
differentiators.description: As a locally-rooted organization, we bring authentic cultural understanding and deep community connections to every project.

differentiators.title: Sustainable Model
differentiators.description: Our social enterprise model ensures long-term sustainability for both our business operations and our training programs.

differentiators.title: Partnership Approach
differentiators.description: We collaborate closely with international partners like Media Education Babelsberg to bring world-class training to Rwanda.

differentiators.title: Proven Track Record
differentiators.description: Hundreds of creatives trained, multiple successful productions, and measurable impact on Rwanda's media landscape.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We maintain the highest professional standards in every project we undertake.

values.title: Empowerment
values.description: We believe in creating opportunities that enable people to build sustainable careers.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: We operate with transparency and honesty in all our business and training activities.

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: We work together with communities, partners, and clients to achieve shared goals.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We continuously seek creative solutions to both production challenges and social needs.

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: We build models that create lasting positive change for people and the industry.
